name: Monumental
description:
It was 2013, I was 22 and just broke up with my then girlfriend.
 I thought to myself, what’s the craziest thing I can do?

Then I made a rash decision and booked a plane ticket and went solo traveling to Nepal, because I’ve wanted to see the Himalayas up close.  I took thousands of images during this trip, but the most memorable one was this shot.

Being able to witness the Himalayan Mountain range after a whole day of trekking felt rather Monumental.
